channel.title: duolingo on Monoglot Anxiety
channel.description: Recent content in duolingo on Monoglot Anxiety

item.title: Is Duolingo bad?
item.description: Is Duolingo bad? You’ve probably heard a lot of criticisms of this popular app if you’ve been hanging around language learning communities online. Duolingo gets a lot of flack, and there’s good reason for that. Nobody is going to reach fluency in a foreign language just by using a game app, and a lot of Duolingo users seem to think they can. Still, I think many critics miss an important point: Duolingo scratches the phone itch. And that’s no small thing.
